text: Abul Hasnat ( – 11 June 2019) was an Indian physician and politician. He was elected as MLA of Magrahat Paschim Vidhan Sabha Constituency in West Bengal Legislative Assembly in 2006. ==Biography== Hasnat received MBBS degree under Kolkata University in 1976 and receive MS degree from Patna University in 1981. He was elected as a member of the West Bengal Legislative Assembly from Magrahat Paschim in 2006. Hasnat died on 11 June 2019 at the age of 64. ==References== Category:1950s births Category:2019 deaths Category:Communist Party of India (Marxist) politicians Category:West Bengal MLAs 2006–2011 Category:Indian medical doctors Category:University of Calcutta alumni Category:Patna University alumni Category:People from South 24 Parganas district
title: Abul Hasnat
